alert.note: Alert for Lower Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 10:36AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Plaquemines Parish through 1115 AM CDT... At 1035 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of Empire to 19 miles southwest of Port Sulphur. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Sulphur, Boothville-venice, Boothville, Empire, Buras, Buras-triumph, Venice and Boothville Asos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.
